description: A collection of circles in a parallelogram-shaped formation; there is also a very long, thin triangular formation with the point on the bottom extending upwards from the top right corner of the parallelogram-shaped formation and a rectangular formation that tapers upwards into a triangle extending upwards from the top left corner of the parallelogram-shaped formation. Each circle has a different number in the center denoting how many lines stem from that point. There is a very dark blue triangle at the bottom of the rectangular formation and another dark blue triangle at the bottom of the parallelogram-shaped formation.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
